title: Golden Spike National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Golden Spike National Historic Site National Park Service Birthday      Location: Golden Spike National Historic Site Fees: Fees will be waived     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Annually, Every 25th of August  from 08/25/2015 to 08/25/2036 On August 25, 1916 the National Park Service was established in order to preserve unimpaired the natural and cultural resources and values of the national park system for the enjoyment, education, and inspiration of this and future generations.
